testsuite.name: Feature: Search for hotels on phptravels portal as a guest user
Scenario: Guest user searches for hotels

testcase.name: Given Open the application as guest user
testcase.classname: Scenario: Guest user searches for hotels

testcase.name: When I populate all mandatory fields
testcase.classname: Scenario: Guest user searches for hotels

testcase.name: And click on Search button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Guest user searches for hotels

testcase.name: Then All hotel results should get returned for guest user
testcase.classname: Scenario: Guest user searches for hotels

testsuite.name: Feature: Search for hotels on phptravels portal as a registered user
Scenario: Registered user searches for hotels

testcase.name: Given Open the application as registered user
testcase.classname: Scenario: Registered user searches for hotels

testcase.name: When I go to Login screen
testcase.classname: Scenario: Registered user searches for hotels

testcase.name: And enter valid credentials and click on Login button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Registered user searches for hotels

testcase.name: Then Account screen should appear
testcase.classname: Scenario: Registered user searches for hotels

testcase.name: When I go to home screen and search for hotel
testcase.classname: Scenario: Registered user searches for hotels

testcase.name: Then All hotel results should get returned for registered user
testcase.classname: Scenario: Registered user searches for hotels
